keyMappings:
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map u goBack
map <c-r> goForward
map i focusInput
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map <a-h> previousTab
map <a-l> nextTab
map o Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map O Vomnibar.activate
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map c createTab
map q removeTab
map Q restoreTab
map P openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map p openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map <a-Tab> visitPreviousTab
map w Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=w
map s Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=g
map v Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=v
map a Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=a
searchEngines:
w: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php?search=%s ArchWiki
v: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
a: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/?O=0&SeB=nd&K=%s&outdated=&SB=n&SO=a&PP=50&do_Search=Go AUR
